name: Ahriman

unit.name: Scryer of Fates (Psychic)
unit.description: If your army includes this model, after both players have deployed their armies, you can select up to three THOUSAND SONS units from your army and redeploy them. When doing so, you can set those units up in Strategic Reserves if you wish, regardless of how many units are already in Strategic Reserves.

unit.name: Arch-Sorcerer of Tzeentch (Psychic)
unit.description: Each time this model attempts a Ritual , add 1 to the Psychic test result.

composition.description: 1 Ahriman – EPIC HERO This model is equipped with: inferno bolt pistol; Transmogrifying Blast; Black Staff of Ahriman.

leaderAttachableTo: Rubric Marines Tzaangor Enlightened Tzaangor Enlightened with Fatecaster Greatbows

unit.name: Servile Pawns
unit.description: While this model is within 3" of one or more friendly THOUSAND SONS INFANTRY units, this model has the Lone Operative ability.

unit.name: Spirit Snare
unit.description: Each time a friendly THOUSAND SONS PSYKER model with the Cabal of Sorcerers ability is destroyed while within 9" of one or more models with this ability, select one of those models with this ability: until the end of the battle, each time the selected model attempts a Ritual, add 1 to the Psychic test result (to a maximum of +2).

unit.name: Glamour of Tzeentch (Aura, Psychic)
unit.description: While a friendly THOUSAND SONS INFANTRY unit is within 6" of this model, models in that unit have the Stealth ability.

composition.description: 1 Daemon Prince of Tzeentch This model is equipped with: Dark Blessing; infernal cannon; heliforged weapons.

name: Daemon Prince of Tzeentch with Wings

unit.name: Hunter of Souls
unit.description: Each time this model makes an attack that targets a CHARACTER unit, re-roll a Hit roll of 1 and re-roll a Wound roll of 1 (if that attack targets a PSYKER  CHARACTER unit, you can re-roll the Hit roll and you can re-roll the Wound roll instead). Each time this model destroys a CHARACTER unit, this model regains up to D3 lost wounds (if that CHARACTER unit was a PSYKER unit, this model regains up to 3 lost wounds instead).

unit.name: Aetherstride (Psychic)
unit.description: In your Movement phase , when this model is set up on the battlefield using the Deep Strike ability, it can perform an aetherstride. If it does:  It can be set up anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 6" horizontally away from all enemy units. Until the end of the turn, its Dark Blessing has the [SUSTAINED HITS D3] ability. Until the end of the turn, it is not eligible to declare a charge .

composition.description: 1 Daemon Prince of Tzeentch with Wings This model is equipped with: Dark Blessing; infernal cannon; heliforged weapons.

unit.name: Arcane Shield (Psychic)
unit.description: While this model is leading a unit, models in that unit have a 4+ invulnerable save .

unit.name: Rebind Rubricae (Psychic)
unit.description: In your Command phase , if this model is leading a unit, you can roll one D6: on a 1, that unit suffers D3 mortal wounds ; on a 2-5, you can return 1 destroyed Bodyguard model to that unit; on a 6, you can return up to 2 destroyed Bodyguard models to that unit.

composition.description: 1 Exalted Sorcerer This model is equipped with: Astral Blast; inferno bolt pistol; force weapon.

leader.name: Arcane Shield (Psychic)
leader.description: While this model is leading a unit, models in that unit have a 4+ invulnerable save .

name: Exalted Sorcerer on Disc of Tzeentch

unit.name: Illusions of Tzeentch (Psychic)
unit.description: While this model is leading a unit, that unit can only be selected as the target of a ranged attack if the attacking model is within 18".

unit.name: Binding Tendrils (Psychic)
unit.description: In your Shooting phase , after this model has shot, select one enemy INFANTRY unit hit by one or more of those attacks made with Arcane Fire. Until the start of your next turn, that unit is ensnared. While a unit is ensnared, subtract 2" from its Move characteristic and subtract 2 from Charge rolls made for it.

composition.description: 1 Exalted Sorcerer This model is equipped with: Arcane Fire; inferno bolt pistol; force weapon.

leader.name: Illusions of Tzeentch (Psychic)
leader.description: While this model is leading a unit, that unit can only be selected as the target of a ranged attack if the attacking model is within 18".

leaderAttachableTo: Rubric Marines Tzaangor Enlightened Tzaangor Enlightened with Fatecaster Greatbows

rangedWeapons.name: Fires of the Abyss – focused witchfire

unit.name: Malefic Maelstrom (Psychic)
unit.description: While this model is leading a unit, weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability.

unit.name: Glimpse of Eternity (Psychic)
unit.description: Once per turn, you can change the result of one Hit roll , one Wound roll or one saving throw made for this model to an unmodified 6.

composition.description: 1 Infernal Master This model is equipped with: inferno bolt pistol; Fires of the Abyss; force weapon.

leader.name: Malefic Maelstrom (Psychic)
leader.description: While this model is leading a unit, weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability.

unit.name: One Head Looks Forward
unit.description: At the end of your Command phase , if this model is on the battlefield, take a Leadership test for this model; if that test is passed, you gain 1CP.

unit.name: One Head Looks Back (Aura)
unit.description: Each time your opponent targets a unit from their army with a Stratagem , if that unit is within 12" of this model, increase the cost of that use of that Stratagem by 1CP.

composition.description: 1 Kairos Fateweaver – EPIC HERO This model is equipped with: Infernal Gateway; Staff of Tomorrow.

unit.name: Daemon Lord of Tzeentch (Aura)
unit.description: While a friendly SCINTILLATING LEGIONS unit is within 6" of this model, each time a model in that unit makes a ranged attack, add 1 to the Strength characteristic of that attack.

unit.name: Master of Magicks (Psychic)
unit.description: In your Shooting phase , select one of the following abilities: [IGNORES COVER] ; [LETHAL HITS] ; [SUSTAINED HITS D3] . Until the end of the phase, this model’s Bolt of Change has that ability.

composition.description: 1 Lord of Change This model is equipped with: Bolt of Change; staff of Tzeentch.

unit.name: Unearthly Power
unit.description: At the start of the battle round , select one of the abilities in the Crimson King section (see left). Until the start of the next battle round, this model has that ability.

unit.name: Lord of the Planet of the Sorcerers (Psychic)
unit.description: This model can attempt up to two Rituals per turn instead of one, and each time this model attempts a Ritual, add 2 to the Psychic test result.

composition.description: 1 Magnus the Red – EPIC HERO This model is equipped with: Gaze of Magnus; Tzeentch’s Firestorm; blade of Magnus.

unit.name: Empyric Guidance (Psychic)
unit.description: While this model is leading a unit, weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [LETHAL HITS] ability.

unit.name: Twisted Sorceries (Psychic)
unit.description: Once per battle, in your Shooting phase or the Fight phase , this model can use this ability. If it does, until the end of the phase, improve the Strength and Attacks characteristics of Psychic weapons equipped by this model by 3.

composition.description: 1 Sorcerer This model is equipped with: inferno bolt pistol; Pandaemonic Delusion; force weapon.

leader.name: Empyric Guidance (Psychic)
leader.description: While this model is leading a unit, weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [LETHAL HITS] ability.

unit.name: Empyric Guidance (Psychic)
unit.description: While this model is leading a unit, weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [LETHAL HITS] ability.

unit.name: Marked by Fate (Psychic)
unit.description: At the start of your Shooting phase , select one enemy unit that is visible to this PSYKER model. Until the end of the phase, each time a model in this unit makes an attack that targets that enemy unit, add 1 to the Hit roll .

composition.description: 1 Sorcerer In Terminator Armour This model is equipped with: Gaze of Hate; inferno combi-bolter; force weapon.

leader.name: Empyric Guidance (Psychic)
leader.description: While this model is leading a unit, weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [LETHAL HITS] ability.

name: Tzaangor Shaman

unit.name: Bestial Prophet
unit.description: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, add 1 to the Hit roll .

unit.name: Sacrificial Blessing
unit.description: While this model is leading a unit, in your Shooting phase and the Fight phase , each time that unit is selected to shoot or fight, this model can use this ability. If it does, select one Bodyguard model in that unit; that Bodyguard model is destroyed and, until the end of the phase, add D3 to the Attacks and Strength characteristics of Psychic weapons equipped by this model.

composition.description: 1 Tzaangor Shaman This model is equipped with: Baleful Devolution; force stave.

leader.name: Bestial Prophet
leader.description: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, add 1 to the Hit roll .

name: Chaos Lord On Disc Of Tzeentch

unit.name: Lord of Chaos
unit.description: Once per battle round , one unit from your army with this ability can use it when its unit is targeted with a Stratagem . If it does, reduce the CP cost of that use of that Stratagem by 1CP.

unit.name: Lord of Fate
unit.description: While this model is leading a unit, models in that unit have the Feel No Pain 5+ ability against mortal wounds .

composition.description: 1 Chaos Lord on Disc of Tzeentch This model is equipped with: bolt pistol; Astartes chainsword; close combat weapon.

leader.name: Lord of Fate
leader.description: While this model is leading a unit, models in that unit have the Feel No Pain 5+ ability against mortal wounds .

name: Blue Horrors
keywords: HORRORS BLUE HORRORS: BLUE BRIMSTONE HORRORS: BRIMSTONE

unit.name: Split
unit.description: Each time a BLUE  HORROR model in this unit is destroyed, after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, if this unit is not destroyed, roll one D6 for that model. On a 4+, add one BRIMSTONE  HORROR model to this unit.

unit.name: Sullen Malevolence (Aura)
unit.description: While an enemy unit is within 6" of this unit, if this unit contains one or more BLUE  HORROR models, worsen the Leadership characteristic of models in that enemy unit by 1.

unit.name: Exploding Horrors
unit.description: Each time this unit is selected to fight, you can select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of it, then select one or more BRIMSTONE  HORROR models in this unit. For each BRIMSTONE  HORROR model you select, roll one D6: on a 4+, that model is destroyed and that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound .

composition.description: 10 Blue Horrors Every Blue Horror is equipped with: coruscating blue flames; blue claws. Every Brimstone Horror added to this unit using the Split ability is equipped with: coruscating yellow flames; yellow claws.

name: Pink Horrors
keywords: HORRORS PINK HORRORS: PINK BLUE HORRORS: BLUE BRIMSTONE HORRORS: BRIMSTONE

unit.name: Split
unit.description: Each time a PINK  HORROR or BLUE  HORROR model in this unit is destroyed, after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, if this unit is not destroyed, roll one D6 for that model. On a 4+, if it was a PINK  HORROR , add two BLUE  HORROR models to this unit, and if it was a BLUE  HORROR , add one BRIMSTONE  HORROR model to this unit.

unit.name: Daemonic Icon
unit.description: Models in the bearer’s unit have a Leadership characteristic of 6+.

unit.name: Instrument of Chaos
unit.description: Add 1 to Charge rolls made for the bearer’s unit.

composition.description: 10 Pink Horrors Every Pink Horror is equipped with: coruscating pink flames; pink claws. Every Blue Horror added to this unit using the Split ability is equipped with: coruscating blue flames; blue claws. Every Brimstone Horror added to this unit using the Split ability is equipped with: coruscating yellow flames; yellow claws.

name: Rubric Marines
keywords: RUBRIC MARINES ASPIRING SORCERER ONLY: PSYKER

unit.name: Bringers of Change
unit.description: Each time a model in this unit makes a ranged attack, re-roll a Wound roll of 1. If that attack targets a unit within range of an objective marker you do not control, you can re-roll the Wound roll instead.

unit.name: Icon of Flame
unit.description: Ranged weapons equipped by models in the bearer’s unit (excluding CHARACTERS ) have the [IGNORES COVER] ability.

composition.description: 1 Aspiring Sorcerer 4-9 Rubric Marines The Aspiring Sorcerer is equipped with: inferno bolt pistol; Malefic Curse; force weapon. Every Rubric Marine is equipped with: inferno boltgun; close combat weapon.

unit.name: Sorcerous Support
unit.description: In your Shooting phase , after this model has shot, select one enemy unit hit by one or more of those attacks. Until the end of the phase, each time a friendly model that disembarked from this TRANSPORT this turn makes a Psychic Attack that targets that enemy unit, add 1 to the Hit roll and add 1 to the Wound roll .

composition.description: 1 Chaos Rhino This model is equipped with: inferno combi-bolter; armoured tracks.

unit.name: Termite Assault
unit.description: This model must start the battle in Reserves , but neither it nor any units embarked within it are counted towards any limits placed on the maximum number of Reserves units you can start the battle with. This model can be set up in the Reinforcements step of your first, second or third Movement phase , regardless of any mission rules. Any units embarked within this model can disembark after it has been set up on the battlefield, and if they do they must be set up more than 9" away from all enemy models.

composition.description: 1 Terrax-pattern Termite This model is equipped with: Terrax melta cutter; 2 combi-bolters; Termite drill.

unit.name: Assault Ramp
unit.description: Each time a unit disembarks from this TRANSPORT after it has made a Normal move , that unit is still eligible to declare a charge this turn.

composition.description: 1 Chaos Land Raider This model is equipped with: 2 soulshatter lascannons; twin inferno heavy bolter; armoured tracks.

unit.name: Ensorcelled Annihilation
unit.description: Each time this model makes a ranged attack that targets a MONSTER or VEHICLE unit that was hit by one or more Psychic Attacks made by a THOUSAND SONS PSYKER model from your army this phase (including the Doombolt Ritual ), you can re-roll the Hit roll and you can re-roll the Damage roll.

composition.description: 1 Chaos Predator Annihilator This model is equipped with: Predator twin lascannon; armoured tracks.

unit.name: Ensorcelled Destruction
unit.description: Each time this model makes a ranged attack that targets a unit (excluding MONSTERS and VEHICLES ) that was hit by one or more Psychic Attacks made by a THOUSAND SONS PSYKER model from your army this phase (including the Doombolt Ritual ), improve the Strength and Armour Penetration characteristics of that attack by 1.

composition.description: 1 Chaos Predator Destructor This model is equipped with: Predator autocannon; armoured tracks.

unit.name: Regenerating Monstrosities
unit.description: At the start of each player’s Command phase , one model in this unit regains up to 3 lost wounds.

composition.description: 2 Chaos Spawn Every model is equipped with: hideous mutations.

unit.name: Siege Shield
unit.description: When making ranged attacks with its demolisher cannon, this model can target enemy units within Engagement Range of it (provided no other friendly units are also within Engagement Range of that enemy unit). In addition, when making ranged attacks, this model does not suffer the penalty to its Hit rolls for being within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.

composition.description: 1 Chaos Vindicator This model is equipped with: demolisher cannon; armoured tracks.

unit.name: Scuttling Walker
unit.description: Each time this model makes a Normal , Advance or Fall Back move , it can move through friendly MONSTER and VEHICLE models and sections of terrain features that are 4" or less in height.

unit.name: Destroyer of Futures
unit.description: Each time you target this unit with the Fire Overwatch Stratagem, hits are scored on unmodified Hit rolls of 5+ when resolving that Stratagem. For each of those attacks that targets an enemy unit within 9" of one or more THOUSAND SONS PSYKER units from your army, a hit is scored on an unmodified Hit roll of 4+ instead.

composition.description: 1 Defiler This model is equipped with: Defiler cannon; reaper autocannon; twin heavy flamer; Defiler claws.

unit.name: Bounding Leaps
unit.description: This unit is eligible to shoot in a turn in which it Fell Back .

composition.description: 1 Pyrocaster 2-5 Flamers Every model is equipped with: flickering flames; Flamer mouths.

unit.name: Blazing Salvoes
unit.description: In your Shooting phase , after this model has shot, select one enemy unit hit by one or more of those attacks. Until the start of your next turn, that enemy unit is suppressed. While a unit is suppressed, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll .

composition.description: 1 Forgefiend This model is equipped with: 2 Hades autocannons; 1 Forgefiend jaws.

unit.name: Terrifying Assault
unit.description: In your Shooting phase and the Fight phase , after this model has shot or fought, select one enemy unit hit by one or more of those attacks. That unit must take a Battle-shock test , subtracting 1 from that test if it is within 9" of one or more THOUSAND SONS PSYKER units from your army.

unit.name: Devoted to Destruction
unit.description: If this model is equipped with two melee weapons in addition to its close combat weapon, add 2 to the Attacks characteristic of those two weapons.

composition.description: 1 Helbrute This model is equipped with: missile launcher; multi-melta; close combat weapon.

unit.name: Flame-wreathed
unit.description: Each time this model ends a Normal move , select one enemy unit it moved over during that move. Until the end of the turn, models in that unit cannot have the Benefit of Cover .

composition.description: 1 Heldrake This model is equipped with: Hades autocannon; Heldrake claws.

unit.name: Snarling Protector
unit.description: You can target this model with the Heroic Intervention Stratagem for 0CP, and can do so even if you have already targeted a different unit with that Stratagem this phase. In addition, each time this model declares a charge that targets an enemy unit within Engagement Range of one or more THOUSAND SONS PSYKER units from your army, you can re-roll the Charge roll .

composition.description: 1 Maulerfiend This model is equipped with: lasher tendrils; Maulerfiend fists.

unit.name: Mutating Vortex (Aura)
unit.description: At the end of your Movement phase , roll one D6 for each enemy unit within 6" of this model: on a 2-3, that unit suffers 1 mortal wound ; on a 4-5, that unit suffers D3 mortal wounds; on a 6, that unit suffers D6 mortal wounds. Each enemy unit within range of this ability must then take a Battle-shock test .

unit.name: Immaterial Flare (Aura)
unit.description: While a friendly THOUSAND SONS PSYKER model is within 6" of this model, each time that model Channels the Warp , add 1 to the Psychic test result. This is not cumulative with any other modifiers to the Psychic test result.

composition.description: 1 Mutalith Vortex Beast This model is equipped with: warp vortex; betentacled maw; Mutalith claws.

name: Scarab Occult Terminators
keywords: SCARAB OCCULT SCARAB OCCULT SORCERER ONLY: PSYKER

faction: Cabal of Sorcerers (Scarab Occult Sorcerer only)

unit.name: Rites of Coalescence
unit.description: While this unit contains one or more PSYKER models, each time an attack targets this unit, subtract 1 from the Wound roll .

composition.description: 1 Scarab Occult Sorcerer 4-9 Scarab Occult Terminators The Scarab Occult Sorcerer is equipped with: inferno combi-bolter; Malefic Curse; force weapon. Every Scarab Occult Terminator is equipped with: inferno combi-bolter; Prosperine khopesh.

unit.name: Slashing Dive
unit.description: In your Movement phase , after this unit ends a Normal move , you can select one enemy unit it moved over during that move and roll one D6 for each model in this unit: for each 4+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound .

composition.description: 3-6 Screamers Every model is equipped with: lamprey bite.

unit.name: Prophetic Sentinels
unit.description: Once per battle round , you can target this unit with the Fire Overwatch or Heroic Intervention Stratagem for 0CP.

composition.description: 2-4 Sekhetar Robots Every model is equipped with: heavy warpflamer; hellfyre missile rack; pyreflux meltagun; close combat weapon.

unit.name: Prophesied Doom
unit.description: Each time this unit ends a Charge move , select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of it, then roll one D6 for each model in this unit that is within Engagement Range of that enemy unit: for each 4+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound .

composition.description: 1 Aviarch 2-5 Enlightened Every model is equipped with: divining spear.

unit.name: Malign Trickery
unit.description: Once per turn, when an enemy unit ends a Normal , Advance or Fall Back move within 9" of this unit, if this unit is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, it can make a Normal move of up to D6".

composition.description: 1 Aviarch 2-5 Enlightened Every model is equipped with: fatecaster greatbow; close combat weapon.

unit.name: Ambushing Hunters
unit.description: At the end of your opponent’s turn, if this unit is more than 6" horizontally away from all enemy units, you can remove this unit from the battlefield and place it into Strategic Reserves .

unit.name: Brayhorn
unit.description: You can re-roll Advance and Charge rolls made for the bearer’s unit.

unit.name: Herd Banner
unit.description: While the bearer’s unit is within range of one or more objective markers you control, improve the Leadership characteristic of models in the bearer’s unit by 1.

composition.description: 1 Twistbray 9-19 Tzaangors Every model is equipped with: Tzaangor blades.

unit.name: Atomantic Arc-reactor
unit.description: Each time this unit shoots its Cerberus neutron pulse array in your Shooting phase , provided it Remained Stationary this turn, that weapon has the [LETHAL HITS] ability.

composition.description: 1 Cerberus This model is equipped with: Cerberus neutron pulse array; armoured tracks.

unit.name: Aerial Assault
unit.description: Each time a unit with the Deep Strike ability disembarks from this model after it has made a Normal move , that unit is still eligible to declare a charge this turn.

unit.name: Thunderhawk Cluster Bombs
unit.description: Each time the bearer ends a Normal move , you can select one enemy unit it moved over during that move and roll six D6: for each 3+, that unit suffers 1 mortal wound .

composition.description: 1 Chaos Thunderhawk This model is equipped with: 2 lascannons; Thunderhawk heavy cannon; 4 twin heavy bolters; armoured hull; Thunderhawk cluster bombs.

unit.name: Deredeo Strike
unit.description: Each time this model makes a ranged attack that targets a unit that is not Below Half-strength , you can re-roll the Hit roll .

composition.description: 1 Deredeo Dreadnought This model is equipped with: anvilus autocannon battery; twin heavy bolter; armoured feet.

unit.name: Titan-killer
unit.description: Each time this model makes a ranged attack with its twin Falchion volcano cannon that targets a MONSTER or VEHICLE unit, that attack has the [DEVASTATING WOUNDS] ability.

composition.description: 1 Falchion This model is equipped with: 2 quad lascannons; twin heavy bolter; twin Falchion volcano cannon; armoured tracks.

unit.name: Rolling Fortress
unit.description: Each time a ranged attack is allocated to a model from your army, if that model is not fully visible to every model in the attacking unit because of this Fellblade model, that model has the Benefit of Cover against that attack.

composition.description: 1 Fellblade This model is equipped with: demolisher cannon; Fellblade accelerator cannon; 2 quad lascannons; twin heavy bolter; armoured tracks.

unit.name: Strafing Run
unit.description: Each time this model makes a ranged attack that targets a unit that cannot Fly , add 1 to the Hit roll .

composition.description: 1 Fire Raptor Gunship This model is equipped with: twin avenger bolt cannon; 2 twin autocannons; 2 twin hellstrike launchers; armoured hull

unit.description: Each time this model makes a ranged attack that targets a unit that can FLY , add 1 to the Hit roll .

composition.description: 1 Hell Blade This model is equipped with: 2 twin autocannons; armoured hull.

unit.name: Bomb Rack
unit.description: Each time this model ends a Normal move , you can select one enemy unit it moved across during that move and roll six D6: for each 3+, that unit suffers 1 mortal wound .

composition.description: 1 Hell Talon This model is equipped with: autocannon; twin lascannon; armoured hull.

unit.description: When making ranged attacks, this model can target enemy units within Engagement Range of it with Blast weapons (provided no other friendly units are also within Engagement Range of that enemy unit). In addition, when making ranged attacks, this model does not suffer the penalty to its Hit rolls for being within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.

unit.description: Each time a unit disembarks from this model after it has made a Normal move , that unit is still eligible to declare a charge this turn.

composition.description: 1 Land Raider Achilles This model is equipped with: quad launcher; 2 twin volkite culverins; armoured tracks.

unit.name: Assault Ramp
unit.description: Each time a unit disembarks from this model after it has made a Normal move , that unit is still eligible to declare a charge this turn.

unit.name: Explorator Augury Web
unit.description: Enemy units that are set up on the battlefield as Reinforcements cannot be set up within 12" of this bearer, but the bearer must halve its Transport Capacity .

composition.description: 1 Land Raider Proteus This model is equipped with: 2 twin lascannons; armoured tracks.

unit.name: Duty Eternal
unit.description: Each time an attack is allocated to this model, subtract 1 from the Damage characteristic of that attack.

composition.description: 1 Leviathan Dreadnought This model is equipped with: 2 heavy flamers; 2 grav-flux bombards; armoured feet.

unit.name: Inviolable Transport
unit.description: Once per battle round , when an attack is allocated to this model, you can change the Damage characteristic of that attack to 0.

composition.description: 1 Mastodon This model is equipped with: 2 heavy flamers; 2 lascannons; siege melta array; skyreaper battery; armoured tracks.

unit.name: Powerful Volley
unit.description: Each time this model shoots in your Shooting phase , provided it Remained Stationary this turn, all [HEAVY] weapons equipped by models in this unit have the [LETHAL HITS] ability.

composition.description: 1 Rapier Carrier This model is equipped with: boltgun; quad heavy bolter; close combat weapon.

unit.name: Even In Death I Serve
unit.description: The first time this model is destroyed, remove it from play without resolving its Deadly Demise ability. Then, at the end of the phase, roll one D6: on a 2+, set this model back up on the battlefield as close as possible to where it was destroyed and not within Engagement Range of any enemy units, with D6 wounds remaining.

composition.description: 1 Relic Contemptor Dreadnought This model is equipped with: 2 heavy plasma cannons; armoured feet.

unit.name: Armoured Spearhead
unit.description: Each time this model makes an attack that targets an enemy unit, re-roll a Hit roll of 1 and, if that unit is within range of an objective marker you do not control, you can re-roll the Hit roll instead.

composition.description: 1 Sicaran Battle Tank This model is equipped with: heavy bolter; Herakles-pattern autocannon; armoured tracks.

unit.name: Rotating Death
unit.description: This model’s Punisher rotary cannon has the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability when targeting INFANTRY units.

composition.description: 1 Sicaran Punisher This model is equipped with: heavy bolter; Punisher rotary cannon; armoured tracks.

unit.name: Ferocious Assault
unit.description: Each time this model makes a ranged attack that targets the closest eligible MONSTER or VEHICLE unit, add 1 to the Hit roll .

composition.description: 1 Sicaran Venator This model is equipped with: heavy bolter; Venator neutron laser; armoured tracks.

unit.name: Aerial Assault
unit.description: Each time a unit with the Deep Strike ability disembarks from this model after it has made a Normal move , that unit is still eligible to declare a charge this turn.

composition.description: 1 Sokar-pattern Stormbird This model is equipped with: hellstrike missile battery; 3 twin heavy bolters; 4 twin lascannons; armoured hull.

unit.name: Assault Ramp
unit.description: Each time a unit disembarks from this model after it has made a Normal move , that unit is still eligible to declare a charge this turn.

composition.description: 1 Spartan This model is equipped with: 2 quad lascannons; twin heavy bolter; armoured tracks.

unit.name: Armoured Resilience
unit.description: Each time an attack is allocated to this model, subtract 1 from the Damage characteristic of that attack.

composition.description: 1 Storm Eagle Gunship This model is equipped with: twin heavy bolter; 2 twin hellstrike launchers; vengeance launcher; armoured hull.

unit.name: Sunderer of Fortresses
unit.description: Each time this model makes an attack that targets a VEHICLE , improve the Strength and Damage characteristic of that attack by 1 (if that attack targets a FORTIFICATION unit, improve the Strength and Damage characteristics of that attack by 2 instead).

composition.description: 1 Typhon This model is equipped with: dreadhammer siege cannon; armoured tracks.

unit.name: Pinning Bombardment
unit.description: In your Shooting phase , after this model has shot, if one or more of those attacks made with its Scorpius multi-launcher scored a hit against an enemy INFANTRY unit, that unit must take a Battle-shock test .

composition.description: 1 Whirlwind Scorpius This model is equipped with: Scorpius multi-launcher; armoured tracks.

unit.name: Interceptor
unit.description: Each time this model makes a ranged attack that targets a unit that can Fly , add 1 to the Hit roll .

composition.description: 1 Xiphon Interceptor This model is equipped with: 2 twin lascannons; Xiphon missile battery; armoured hull.
